title: GameIntro.StartNode
body:
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController EmmaVoid>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
So this is how it ends for me
I always knew this might happen
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
it ate away at me in the back of my mind all my life
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController EmmaCage>>
and now 
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController DetectorScene>>
it's happened
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
Manager: ...
Manager: Do you know what this is?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Emma: No
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Manager: It's a Magnussen detector, stupid
Manager: Do you know what that means?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Emma: No
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot5>>
Manager: It means you react to the Theta Crystals
Manager: which means, you get to find them
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Emma: What?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot6>>
Manager: Underneath this facility is a huge cave filled with Theta Crystals
Manager: we use Theta Crystals as a part of the metal refining process
Manager: You're going to be a part of a crew that finds and brings them back to the surface
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Emma: ...Ok
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot5>>
Manager: Mills, get this one in the training corral.
<<goToScene SceneShotController tutorialLevel>>
